page.title: 14THE DARWIN YOUTH CLUB
page.content: {Cont.} There have been incidents of vandalism at the youth club, ranging from the destruction of small notices to the setting fire of curtains. The youth club is publicised by annual programmes which are distributed to schools at the beginning of the academic year in September. Teenagers are allowed to smoke at the youth club although they are advised of the dangers to their health and encouraged not to smoke. There are two youth clubs and a special youth club also in the area. The Lees Brook Youth Club is very good but the Derwent Club is small and ill equipped. On the whole the Darwin Youth Club is well run and well attended by the youngsters in the area.
